abstract: The delivery service said shipments in the United States fell 5.1 percent, the seventh straight decline, as businesses curbed purchases to lower costs.
snippet: The delivery service said shipments in the United States fell 5.1 percent, the seventh straight decline, as businesses curbed purchases to lower costs.
lead_paragraph: United Parcel Service said third-quarter profit fell 43 percent as the recession weighed on demand for domestic package-delivery shipments.

headline.main: U.P.S. Profit Falls on Delivery Cuts
headline.print_headline: U.P.S. Profit Falls On Delivery Cuts
